verses.text: \w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w flask|strong="H6378"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, \w poured|strong="H3332"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* Saul’s \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, \w kissed|strong="H5401"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* said, “\w Has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w ruler|strong="H5057"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*?\f + \fr 10:1 \ft Hebrew; LXX “Has not the LORD anointed you ruler over Israel? And you will rule over the LORD’s people and save them from their enemies around them. This will be the sign to you that the LORD has appointed you to be leader over His inheritance.\f*

\w When|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w leave|strong="H1980"\w* \w me|strong="H5978"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*, \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w at|strong="H3117"\w* \w Rachel|strong="H7354"\w*’s \w tomb|strong="H6900"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w Zelzah|strong="H6766"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*. \w They|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w say|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w*, ‘\w The|strong="H6213"\w* donkeys \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* been \w found|strong="H4672"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w now|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H6213"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w has|strong="H3117"\w* stopped worrying \w about|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* donkeys \w and|strong="H1121"\w* started worrying \w about|strong="H1980"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w*, asking, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w about|strong="H1980"\w* \w my|strong="H1245"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*?”’

\w Then|strong="H5375"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H5704"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w on|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* Oak \f + \fr 10:3 \ft Or Terebinth or Great Tree\f* \w of|strong="H3603"\w* \w Tabor|strong="H8396"\w*. \w Three|strong="H7969"\w* men \w going|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w God|strong="H1008"\w* \w at|strong="H5927"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w* \w will|strong="H5704"\w* \w meet|strong="H4672"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*, \w one|strong="H5375"\w* \w carrying|strong="H5375"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w young|strong="H1423"\w* \w goats|strong="H1423"\w*, another \w carrying|strong="H5375"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w loaves|strong="H3899"\w* \w of|strong="H3603"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* another \w carrying|strong="H5375"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* skin \w of|strong="H3603"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w greet|strong="H7592"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w loaves|strong="H3899"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, \w which|strong="H3899"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w accept|strong="H3947"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w After|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* Gibeah \w of|strong="H5892"\w* God,\f + \fr 10:5 \ft Hebrew Gibeath-Elohim, meaning the hill of God\f* \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w outpost|strong="H5333"\w*. \w As|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w approach|strong="H6293"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w meet|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w group|strong="H2256"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w coming|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w place|strong="H1116"\w*, \w preceded|strong="H6440"\w* \w by|strong="H5892"\w* \w harps|strong="H3658"\w*, \w tambourines|strong="H8596"\w*, \w flutes|strong="H2485"\w*, \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w lyres|strong="H3658"\w*, \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w prophesying|strong="H5012"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* rush \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* transformed \w into|strong="H2015"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* different person.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w these|strong="H6213"\w* signs \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w*, \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w occasion|strong="H4672"\w* demands, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w surely|strong="H6213"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* \w peace|strong="H8002"\w* \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*. \w Wait|strong="H3176"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w show|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w what|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.” Samuel’s Signs Fulfilled

\w As|strong="H3117"\w* \w Saul|strong="H1931"\w* \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* leave \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, God \w changed|strong="H2015"\w* \w Saul|strong="H1931"\w*’s \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* signs \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w When|strong="H5921"\w* \w Saul|strong="H5012"\w* \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* servant arrived \w at|strong="H5921"\w* Gibeah,\f + \fr 10:10 \ft Gibeah means the hill.\f* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w group|strong="H2256"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w met|strong="H7122"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*. \w Then|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* God \w rushed|strong="H6743"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* \w along|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w formerly|strong="H8032"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w prophesying|strong="H5012"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w another|strong="H7453"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w happened|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Kish|strong="H7027"\w*? \w Is|strong="H2088"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w among|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*?”

\w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H6030"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w lived|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w replied|strong="H6030"\w*, “\w And|strong="H6030"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* father?” \w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* saying \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w proverb|strong="H4912"\w*: “\w Is|strong="H4310"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*?”

\w And|strong="H5012"\w* \w when|strong="H3615"\w* \w Saul|strong="H5012"\w* had \w finished|strong="H3615"\w* \w prophesying|strong="H5012"\w*, \w he|strong="H1116"\w* went \w up|strong="H3615"\w* \w to|strong="H1116"\w* \w the|strong="H3615"\w* \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w place|strong="H1116"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3588"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*’s \w uncle|strong="H1730"\w* \w asked|strong="H1245"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w servant|strong="H5288"\w*, “Where \w did|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w*?” “\w To|strong="H1980"\w* \w look|strong="H7200"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* donkeys,” \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* replied. “\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H7586"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w be|strong="H3588"\w* found, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*.”

“\w Tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w*,” \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*’s \w uncle|strong="H1730"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*, “\w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w did|strong="H4100"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* say \w to|strong="H5046"\w* \w you|strong="H5046"\w*?”

\w And|strong="H7586"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* replied, “\w He|strong="H3588"\w* assured \w us|strong="H5046"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* donkeys \w had|strong="H7586"\w* \w been|strong="H5046"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w*.” \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w his|strong="H5046"\w* \w uncle|strong="H1730"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w had|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w about|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* kingship. Saul Proclaimed King

After \w this|strong="H3068"\w*, \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w summoned|strong="H6817"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w*

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* said \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*, “\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w out|strong="H5337"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w rescued|strong="H5337"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w oppressed|strong="H3905"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*.’

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w rejected|strong="H3988"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w saves|strong="H3467"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w troubles|strong="H6869"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w afflictions|strong="H7451"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Him|strong="H6440"\w*, ‘\w No|strong="H3605"\w*, \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*.’ \w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w therefore|strong="H5921"\w* \w present|strong="H3320"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H3320"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* clans.”

Thus \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w come|strong="H7126"\w* \w forward|strong="H7126"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* selected.

\w Then|strong="H7126"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H7586"\w* \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \w come|strong="H7126"\w* \w forward|strong="H7126"\w* \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w its|strong="H3920"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w clan|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Matri|strong="H4309"\w* \w was|strong="H7586"\w* selected.\f + \fr 10:21 \ft LXX includes And he brought the family of the Matrites near, man by man.\f* Finally, \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Kish|strong="H7027"\w* \w was|strong="H7586"\w* selected. \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w when|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w looked|strong="H1245"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w him|strong="H4672"\w*, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* could \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w him|strong="H4672"\w*.

\w So|strong="H1931"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w inquired|strong="H7592"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w Has|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* man \w come|strong="H5750"\w* \w here|strong="H2009"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w*?” \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* replied, “\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w hidden|strong="H2244"\w* \w himself|strong="H1931"\w* among \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w baggage|strong="H3627"\w*.”
